name: Tera & Byte Working Version
description: Tera & Byte is a game where the player controls two ships in a bullet-hell game.  Tera & Byte are able to detect when an enemy comes in between them, and if the Player chooses to, Tera & Byte will slam together to absorb the enemy and gain their abilities.  This game is not quite finished as this is my first game jam and I still have much to learn,  I designed everything in this game on my lonesome and used assets I designed myself.  Much love to Brackeys and BlackThornProd for their amazing tutorials.  Much love to the ChipTone itch.io game that allows you to make free sound effects.
